138.sentence: It's so small and light, even with a spare battery, you really can take it anywhere.

139.sentence: In auto mode anyone can use it as a point and shoot camera.

140.sentence: The manual modes give you a lot of control over exposure and white balance (but there is no manual focus or manual exposure).

141.sentence: There are better cameras but none anywhere near as light and compact.

144.sentence: I've had a lot of cameras, but this one is ACTUALLY being used, and not stored in a desk: it's allways in my shist pocket.

145.sentence: 2- Excellent picture quality and so simple to use!!!

149.sentence: 6- Small but very clear TFT screen.

150.sentence: Don't care about sunlight: it's TFT.

151.sentence: 7- 360 panoramic pictures are a very big deal.

152.sentence: 8- Buttons are little, but If you have steady fingers and dealed with a casio wirst calculator watch, you can deal with almost anything.

153.sentence: Buttons size is OK for me, my wife, but not my grany.

154.sentence: i researched and researched between getting the canon s20 or the canon s100, and of course i got the latter!

155.sentence: I was looking for something that wasn't too complicated to use and to help the pics I post on Ebay show more detial.

156.sentence: This camera is great, wonderfully small, and has attactive hi-tech casing.
